name: MomentumY
description:
In an obstacle course filled with boxes that will kill you on contact, you have only the strength to launch yourself forwards once. Lucky for you, there are several arrowed boxes around that give you the strength to launch yourself again. Make your way down the path with precision and speed to win!

Controls:

Mouse to look around

Hold down spacebar to charge launch

Let go of the spacebar to launch

Pressing R restarts the level

You only have one launch (whether or not you can launch is indicated by the arrow icon on the top left of your screen)

Upon using your launch you can refill it by hitting one of the boxes with a green arrow on it

MomentumY is a pinball puzzle-esc game about using just the right amount of momentum in order to get to the end of the level. This game was made in 4 hours, so there's only one level, and the art style is fairly juvenile. Thanks for checking out my game!

My 2nd fully completed game, so I apologize if there are some bugs (like the untextured brick in the beginning of the level)
